question: Recent figures show an increase in violent crime among youngsters under the age of 18. Some psychologists claim that the basic reason for this is that children these days are not getting the social and emotional learning they need from parents and teachers.To what extent do you agree or disagree with this opinion?
text: Crime rate has been increased at an alarming rate in this scenario . Hence , it is noticed that youngsters are more indulge in  immoral deeds due to lack of parents and tutorial guidence. This essay will accord with the statement as parents have busy schedule and teachers have more  focus on earning rather than teaching.

Commencing with the prominent reason , in this contemporary epoch everyone participate in rat race to earn large sums of money to fulfill their basic and luxuries needs as parents have hectic schedule they do not have much time to focus on their offspring to teach moral values. owing to this,  children become careless and chose bad companies of their friends. For instance , it is generally seen that most of the adults are addicted to the drugs because they do not have proper security and guidence of their elders Therefore , due to the aforementioned reason yongers indulge themselves into immoral conducts

Furthermore, it is considered that teacher also have a good step toward the success of children .Thus, in previous time teachers don't care only students education but also taught moral and social value to them yet nowadays teacher only focus on the academic education according to the salary they earn beside to teach such values  so,students neglect these values to great extent. In this regard , 'The Times' report that  60%of  the school children are addicted to drugs because of the lack of knowledge about  bad results
In conclusion, it can be said that owing to the working era and personal status parents and teachers do not care about the today g
